partnerDetails.about:
Stadler + Schaaf offers fully integrated solutions for the process industry from a single source by drawing on its various business units as needed – competently, reliably and efficiently.

We provide our customers with electrical, instrumentation and control technologies as well as automation systems for safely, reliably and economically operating their plants in Germany, Europe and worldwide.

Stadler + Schaaf stands for efficient and forward-looking solutions that, in addition to electrical instrumentation and control technologies,

also include electrical engineering, automation as well as Industrial IT. Thanks to our sites in Germany and Austria, we are always close at hand and able to provide help, advice and support at short notice.

Stadler + Schaaf is not only a single source provider – but one of the leading industry providers in this segment. We are dedicated to meeting your requirements and ensuring your success.
